title: Can I change the number of slots after renting the server?
content: Yes, you can increase or decrease the number of slots anytime via our upgrade/downgrade feature.

title: Can I connect my Teamspeak 3 server to my own domain?
content: Yes. For domains hosted with us, we provide a guide for TS forwarding. For other providers, contact them if settings differ. Guide: https://zap-hosting.com/guides/docs/en/domain_teamspeak_redirect/

title: Do you offer Teamspeak 5 servers?
content: Yes, they will be available soon and always run on the latest version for the best performance. Learn more here: https://zap-hosting.com/en/teamspeak-5-server-hosting/

title: Can I assign Speechpower to channels on my Teamspeak server?
content: Yes, this can be configured in the channel settings when renting a TS3 server from us.

title: Does a prepaid server end automatically after its term?
content: Yes. It will lock automatically after the booked period ends. You have 14 days to renew before it is deleted.

title: How can I extend my prepaid Teamspeak server?
content: You will receive reminder emails before expiration. Renewal is possible via the web interface and up to 14 days after the term ends.

title: Is there unlimited file upload/download on TS3 servers?
content: Disk space is limited to 50 GB (soft limit). You get a warning if exceeded and have 3 days to reduce usage. Running TS3 on your own server follows that serverâ€™s limits.

title: Can I renew a prepaid server with a different term?
content: Yes. After the term ends, you can choose a new billing cycle. Not available for contract servers.
